channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water leak, 3rd April
item.description:
The leakage is on manor road just before manor court and has been like this for nearly 16 months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 3rd April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary crossing footway closure needed please lift an relay x1 rocking raised 450x450x20mm slab number 1 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet
